componentDescription: A versatile container component to display content in a structured and visually distinct block.

variant.description: Specifies the visual style or theme of the card, determined by the 'Variant' type.

size.description: Determines the predefined dimensions or scale of the card, controlled by the 'Size' type.

shape.description: Defines the border radius or overall form of the card, based on the 'Shape' type.

children.description: Represents the primary content to be rendered inside the card's body.

header.description: Optional content to be displayed in the card's header section.

footer.description: Optional content to be displayed in the card's footer section.

isFullWidth.description: A boolean flag indicating if the card should occupy the full width of its parent container.

views.description: Defines custom styling properties for various parts of the card, overriding default appearance.
